name: Impalevator
description:
Enjoy the everyday worklife in the underworld!

Play as an imp in this endless elevator simulator (with elevator music!).

Impale other imps on their way to work, safely transport your client to their workplace with the elevator crank, or sing along to the elevator music (you might even get a power-up!).

YOUR JOB

  • Manage the elevator with the crank on the right to transport your client through the underworld.
  • Defend the elevator from inattentive imps on their way to work by shooting at them.
  • And if you have a calm moment, maybe sing along to the elevator music with the mic on the left :)

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar - Shoot

Hold Spacebar - Crank / Sing
